short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that changes a user's new tab to display nearby restaurants, encouraging the support of local businesses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that encourages the support of local restaurants by changing a user's new tab to display nearby restaurants. Set dietary restrictions, sort by rating or distance, and sort by cuisine to customize your experience! Don't forget to bookmark your favourite local eats!
